title: Please make a Virtual Machine of Windows XP IE 7
body: I can get IE 6 and 8 on Windows XP in your virtual machine downloads, but IE 7 is only available on Vista.  I don't have infinite room on my hard drive, and I much prefer the 2-3 GB machine rather than the 10+ GB Vista machine.  I definitely don't use XP any more for everyday use, but for testing IE its still a fine, fast OS.
